alert.note: Alert for Brown; Cherry (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 16 at 7:14PM CDT until September 16 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Cherry County in north central Nebraska... Southwestern Brown County in north central Nebraska... * Until 800 PM CDT. * At 714 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 10 miles northwest of Elsmere, or 25 miles northeast of Thedford, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Hofeld Lake, Moon Lake, Raven, Willow Lake State Wildlife Management Area and Long Lake State Wildlife Management Area. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
